articles.title: FirstGroup sells US bus divisions for £3.3bn - BBC News
articles.description: The move comes more than a year after the transport giant first announced plans to quit North America.
articles.content:
image copyrightFirstGroup
Transport giant FirstGroup has announced the sale of two US bus divisions in a deal worth £3.3bn.
The sale of its First Student and First Transit arms to EQT Infrastructur… [+1435 chars]

articles.author: Mary Ward, Katina Curtis
articles.title: Highest day of quarantine cases all year as officials eye growing overseas cases - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Arrivals from India, Bangladesh and Pakistan constitute the majority of Sydney’s COVID-19 variant cases over the past month, as health officials monitor the growing number of cases in Latin America and Europe.
articles.content:
The pandemic is raging around the world and I dont expect this to be the last time when we have to make such a decision, he said.
